heading: HR02502
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING, IN THE STRONGEST TERMS POSSIBLE, THE BOMBING OF THE MUSLIM MOSQUE IN THE CITY OF ZAMBOANGA, EXTENDING OUR DEEPEST SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE INNOCENT VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION, AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS OF THE COWARDLY ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-02-08
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02502
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING, IN THE STRONGEST TERMS POSSIBLE, THE BOMBING OF THE MUSLIM MOSQUE IN THE CITY OF ZAMBOANGA, EXTENDING OUR DEEPEST SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE INNOCENT VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION, AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS OF THE COWARDLY ACT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, SHERNEE ABUBAKAR
DATE FILED : 2019-02-07
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-02-08
